result.name: north-wales-spurdog-longline-fishery-2008-09-fisheries-science-partnership
result.notes:
To increase knowledge of the spatial and temporal dynamics of spurdog in 
waters off North Wales, to provide contemporary data on the reproductive 
parameters used in demographic models, and to increase understanding of the 
discard survival of fish caught under commercial conditions.

organization.name: marine-environmental-data-information-network
organization.title: Marine Environmental Data & Information Network
organization.description: MEDIN is a partnership of UK organisations committed to improving access to marine data. Our partners are both public and private sector.

resources.description: The Cefas Data Portal contains metadata records and data sets available to download and connect to in support of our commitment to open science. Data is available in the following formats: Binary download.
